summary: Veo and ElevenLabs integration testing complete. All 9 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend Video Lab and FVS System pages working correctly with all UI components functional.
passed_tests: POST /api/video-tasks with provider='veo' creates task with graceful fallback (isMocked: true, actualProvider: mock_veo)
GET /api/video-tasks/{id} returns task status with isMocked and warnings fields
POST /api/video-tasks with provider='runway' correctly mocked (actualProvider: mock_runway)
POST /api/video-tasks with provider='kling' correctly mocked (actualProvider: mock_kling)
Invalid provider correctly rejected with 400/422 status
POST /api/fvs/produce-episode uses ElevenLabs fallback (mock) and OpenAI thumbnail (real)
GET /api/video-tasks returns list of tasks with correct structure
GET /api/assets/library returns assets with provider info
Frontend: Video Lab page loads with provider dropdown containing Veo option
Frontend: Video Lab has Script/Audio/Remix mode buttons
Frontend: Video Lab has Create Video Task button
Frontend: FVS System page loads with automation controls
Frontend: FVS System has Run Brain button and Activity Log
Frontend: FVS System shows Episode Ideas with Produce buttons (34 proposed ideas)
critical_code_review_comments: Graceful fallback pattern implemented correctly - returns mock URL + warning when API key missing
Response includes isMocked, actualProvider, and warnings fields for transparency
Video providers (Veo, Runway, Kling) all have proper fallback handling
ElevenLabs audio falls back to mock URL when ELEVENLABS_API_KEY not set
OpenAI thumbnail generation works via EMERGENT_LLM_KEY

success_rate.frontend: 100% (Video Lab and FVS System pages working)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Veo and ElevenLabs integrations are implemented with graceful fallbacks. When VEO_API_KEY is not set, video tasks use mock_veo provider. When ELEVENLABS_API_KEY is not set, audio uses mock_elevenlabs. Response includes isMocked, actualProvider, and warnings fields. Thumbnail generation uses OpenAI GPT-Image-1 via EMERGENT_LLM_KEY (real). Video Lab UI has Veo in provider dropdown. FVS System has Produce buttons and Activity Log.

mocked_integrations.veo_video: MOCKED - VEO_API_KEY not configured, falls back to mock video URL
mocked_integrations.elevenlabs_audio: MOCKED - ELEVENLABS_API_KEY not configured, falls back to placeholder URL
